content: तपस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [तप्-असुन्] {@--1@} Warmth, heat, fire. {@--2@} Pain, suffering. {@--3@} Penance, religious austerity, mortification; तपः किलेदं तदवाप्तिसाधनं <ls>Ku. 5. 64.</ls> {@--4@} Meditation connected with the practice of personal selfdenial or bodily mortification. {@--5@} Moral virtue, merit. {@--6@} Special duty or observance of any particular caste. {@--7@} One of the seven worlds; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the region above the world called जनस्. {@--8@} The month of religious austerities. {@--9@} A long period of time, Kalpa. {@--10@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) The ninth lunar mansion. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} The month of Māgha; तपसि मंदगभस्तिरभीषुमान् <ls>Śi. 6. 63.</ls> {@--2@} An epithet of Agni. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} , {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} The cold season; (शिशिर). {@--2@} The winter (हेमंत). {@--3@} The hot season (ग्रीष्म).
